pullrequest.title: [gazebo11] Add helper function PhysicsEngine::any_cast to handle std::any

content.raw:
CI failed because a release-tools PR is required. I started a new job with that release-tools branch:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=23)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/23/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/23/
* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/893/osrf-gazebo11-use-citadel-dependencies/diff
